document.full_text: gael monfils of france reached the quarterfinals of his home grand slam, the french open, with a five-set victory over david ferrer of spain.
document.title: monfils delights crowd with five-set victory over ferrer
lines_and_colors: gael monfils of france reached the quarterfinals of his home grand slam, the french open, with a five-set victory over david ferrer of spain.
